Dream Network

Dr. Kathy Martone

Facebook page

Dr. Martone is a Jungian Psychologist and healer in private practice since 1986. She has served as company psychologist for a large corporation and has previously taught at Colorado Free University, Iliff School of Theology, Naropa University and Jungian Ministries International. Steeped in the ancient traditions of Tibetan Buddhism and Celtic Spirituality, Dr. Kathy Martone is a warm and compassionate healer who has crafted a deep intuitive wisdom out of her many and varied life experiences. She has written a book entitled Sacred Wounds that chronicles a woman's spiritual and emotional journey through the dark memories of incest.

Dr. Kathy Martone
